price: ߜߍ߬ߘߍ ߛߊ߫߸ ߊ߲ ߞߵߏ߬ ߟߋ ߝߟߐ߫ ߘߊ߲߫ ߕߊ߫ ߞߟߊߡߊ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
